sentences.sContent: the ever-rising statistics of delinquency and crime

synos.tran: 行为不良，违法犯罪；[法]失职，怠工

remMethod.val: 来自delinquent(a. 有违法倾向的)

words.tran: 有过失的；怠忽的；拖欠债务的
流氓；行为不良的人；失职者

trans.tranOther: illegal or immoral behaviour or actions, especially by young people
